name: part_008
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2025】生誕 3D LIVE 睡夢 - suimu -【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [eV59GTk0J3s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'Starlight' by Shirogane Noel, Houshou Marine, and Usada Pekora.
Shirogane Noel performs her original song 'Tres Bien Night' in a new knight-themed costume.

subtitles.original: 世界の向こうに 届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's reach out to the other side of the world

subtitles.original: 終わることのない この胸の衝動は
subtitles.english: This impulse in my heart that never ends

subtitles.original: どうしたって どうしても ぼくを呼んでいた
subtitles.english: No matter what, it was calling out to me

subtitles.original: だから その先へと
subtitles.english: So, towards what lies ahead

subtitles.original: 走り続ける
subtitles.english: I'll keep on running

subtitles.original: 次へ 次へ
subtitles.english: To the next, to the next

subtitles.original: 夢想だった 中途半端な 凱歌抱えて 立ち尽くしていた
subtitles.english: Clutching a half-baked victory song that was but a dream, I stood still

subtitles.original: 通り雨はプレリュード 何千回 もう何万回も
subtitles.english: The passing shower is a prelude, thousands, tens of thousands of times

subtitles.original: 挑み続けたきみへ ねえ聴かせてよ
subtitles.english: To you who kept on challenging, hey, let me hear it

subtitles.original: 「夢は叶った」って
subtitles.english: Saying "dreams came true"

subtitles.original: 「諦め＝完敗」ならば 絶対にないよ
subtitles.english: If "giving up = complete defeat," then that'll never happen

subtitles.original: だれに邪魔されようと ためらわないで
subtitles.english: No matter who tries to stop you, don't hesitate

subtitles.original: 託された情熱を 落とさずにつないでいく
subtitles.english: Passing on the passion entrusted to me without letting it drop

subtitles.original: そう 最後まで
subtitles.english: Yes, until the very end

subtitles.original: フラッグに誓い 勇ましく旗めいて
subtitles.english: Swearing on the flag, fluttering bravely

subtitles.original: 鳴り止まないファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The fanfare that never stops ringing

subtitles.original: いつも心に 流れていた
subtitles.english: It was always flowing in my heart

subtitles.original: 遠い未来へ 祈るよう
subtitles.english: Like a prayer to the distant future

subtitles.original: 忘れられない あの日々の後悔を
subtitles.english: The regrets of those unforgettable days

subtitles.original: 追いかけて 追いかけて 滑り込んだ
subtitles.english: Chasing, chasing, I slipped into...

subtitles.original: この想い
subtitles.english: This feeling

subtitles.original: 青いソラに ふと溢れていった
subtitles.english: Suddenly overflowed into the blue sky

subtitles.original: 遠く 遠く
subtitles.english: Far away, far away

subtitles.original: トレビアンナイト
subtitles.english: Tres Bien Night

subtitles.original: 終わらない 終わらない 仕事が山積み終わらない
subtitles.english: Never ending, never ending, work is piled up and never ending

subtitles.original: 止まらない 止まらない それでも時間は止まらない
subtitles.english: Won't stop, won't stop, even so, time won't stop

subtitles.original: Yo, Yo!
subtitles.english: Yo, Yo!

subtitles.original: Hate to Hate 溜まり溜まった Hate
subtitles.english: Hate to Hate, the accumulated hate

subtitles.original: 伝播と自壊バット 本望滅する金属バット
subtitles.english: Propagation and self-destruction bat, metal bat that destroys true desires

subtitles.original: Swing! 今日も一杯 今日も一杯
subtitles.english: Swing! Another cup today, another cup today

subtitles.original: Wow! No more 鞭 Gimmie Gimmie juicy
subtitles.english: Wow! No more whip, give me give me juicy

subtitles.original: I see 奔走 Anytime 奔走 Anytime
subtitles.english: I see, rushing anytime, rushing anytime

subtitles.original: はあー 溜息プレッシャーでエネルギーすっからかん
subtitles.english: Phew... Energy is empty from the pressure of sighs

subtitles.original: よいしょー！ 自分自身に厳しすぎちゃう
subtitles.english: Heave-ho! I'm being way too hard on myself

subtitles.original: すぐさまヘラヘラ優等生 さっぱり足りない順応性
subtitles.english: Instantly a smiling honor student, completely lacking adaptability

subtitles.original: 自分自身としっかり向き合う
subtitles.english: Facing myself properly

subtitles.original: 一番必要なものは
subtitles.english: The thing I need the most...

subtitles.original: トレビアン ご褒美 頂戴
subtitles.english: Is a "Tres Bien" reward, please give it to me

subtitles.original: Wah! てんてこ舞いようなリズムにバイバイしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Wah! Say bye-bye to this hectic rhythm

subtitles.original: ドレミファ の音にご覧
subtitles.english: Look at the Do-Re-Mi notes

subtitles.original: Wow! ぎゅーっと詰めちゃダメ どんどんフリーダム
subtitles.english: Wow! Don't cram it in too tight, more and more freedom

subtitles.original: Oh... オーライ オーライ
subtitles.english: Oh... Alright, alright

subtitles.original: 好きなもの食べ放題 オキシトシン増します脳内
subtitles.english: All-you-can-eat favorite things, oxytocin increases in my brain

subtitles.original: ほら もっともっと頂戴 膨大
subtitles.english: Look, give me more and more, huge amount

subtitles.original: Get ready! サボりです たまに空振り
subtitles.english: Get ready! I'm slacking off, occasionally swinging and missing

subtitles.original: 見した彦星 胸張りお祭り
subtitles.english: Showing off the Hikoboshi, chest out at the festival

subtitles.original: いらない まやかしの甘い夜更かし
subtitles.english: Don't need it, the sweet staying up late of fake deception

subtitles.original: ハッピーになるため歌おう 声高らかに
subtitles.english: Let's sing to be happy, voices loud and clear

subtitles.original: 自分自身がやっぱり一番
subtitles.english: After all, I myself am number one

subtitles.original: 理性と欲望が平行線 望みは幸せエンドレス
subtitles.english: Reason and desire are parallel lines, my wish is endless happiness

subtitles.original: 自分自身としっかり付き合う
subtitles.english: Getting along properly with myself

subtitles.original: 我慢は体に毒だよ
subtitles.english: Patience is poison to the body

subtitles.original: トレビアン ご褒美 頂戴
subtitles.english: Is a "Tres Bien" reward, please give it to me

subtitles.original: Wah! てんてこ舞いようなリズムにバイバイしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Wah! Say bye-bye to this hectic rhythm

subtitles.original: ドレミファ の音にご覧
subtitles.english: Look at the Do-Re-Mi notes

subtitles.original: Wah! ぎゅーっと詰めちゃダメ どんどんフリーダム
subtitles.english: Wah! Don't cram it in too tight, more and more freedom

subtitles.original: 一、二の三 はい！
subtitles.english: One, two, three, go!

subtitles.original: 窮屈な靴に 疲弊やすストレス
subtitles.english: Getting tired of cramped shoes, easy stress

subtitles.original: 状態 状況 から解放
subtitles.english: Release from states and situations
